H0.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Gibson Les Paul

H1.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Rickenbacker 360

H2.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Epiphone Casino

H3.text: what kind of guitar did george harrison use. Fender Stratocaster

A4.text: The first recording by The Beatles of this new model 360/12 can be heard on the song 'If I Needed Someone'.

A5.text: George Harrison of The Beatles had been extensively using an earlier style 360/12 (closer resembling the 330/12 model), but retired it immediately from stage performances upon receiving the new style 360/12 (having rounded cutaways and top edge) in August 1965.
